title: Law Global Initiatives Fund
description: To support scholarships, salaries, and program costs, including travel, research grants, and other, for initiatives involving international law, comparative law, or other programs aimed at connecting legal studies to a global society at CU Law.
marketingContent: To support scholarships, salaries, and program costs, including travel, research grants, and other, for initiatives involving international law, comparative law, or other programs aimed at connecting legal studies to a global society at CU Law.
